name: Home
body:
### Welcome to Indium Interactive
Indium Interactive is an independent games company based in Yorkshire. We currently have only 2 employees but the prototyping of the games is happening quick. This website is hosted on HitHub and will only ever go down when GitHub goes down, which is never... Or hardly ever. 

### Staff
We currently only have two team members...
* @MichaelRLaws - Programmer, Artist, Designer, Founder - 2011 -
* @LinkiePie - Artist, Designer, Shitty wizard - 2014 -

### Games
Most of our games will be published to the android and IOS platforms so that our games get "out there*"
We will be releasing games as standalone PC games which one day, we'll try to put on steam because games are hard to make and need to buy food.
 "*out there - 10 downloads would make us happy"

### Game alphas
Here will be a list of game alphas. We can not guarantee that these builds will be bug free as they will be older than what we work on.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
